results.question: How many customers are there?
results.generated_sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers

results.question: How many tracks are there?
results.generated_sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tracks

results.question: List all customers from USA
results.generated_sql: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE Country = 'USA'

results.question: Show all albums by AC/DC
results.generated_sql: SELECT al.Title as Album FROM albums al JOIN artists ar ON al.ArtistId = ar.ArtistId WHERE ar.Name = 'AC/DC'

results.question: What is the total revenue?
results.generated_sql: SELECT SUM(Total) as TotalRevenue FROM invoices

results.question: Show top 5 customers by total spending
results.generated_sql: SELECT c.FirstName, c.LastName, SUM(i.Total) as TotalSpent FROM customers c JOIN invoices i ON c.CustomerId = i.CustomerId GROUP BY c.CustomerId, c.FirstName, c.LastName ORDER BY TotalSpent DESC LIMIT 5

results.question: How many albums does each artist have?
results.generated_sql: SELECT ar.Name as Artist, COUNT(al.AlbumId) as AlbumCount FROM artists ar LEFT JOIN albums al ON ar.ArtistId = al.ArtistId GROUP BY ar.ArtistId, ar.Name ORDER BY AlbumCount DESC

results.question: What are the top 10 most expensive tracks?
results.generated_sql:
SELECT Name, UnitPrice, Composer, Milliseconds 
FROM tracks 
ORDER BY UnitPrice DESC 
LIMIT 10

results.question: Which genre has the most tracks?
results.generated_sql: SELECT g.Name as Genre, COUNT(t.TrackId) as TrackCount FROM genres g LEFT JOIN tracks t ON g.GenreId = t.GenreId GROUP BY g.GenreId, g.Name ORDER BY TrackCount DESC LIMIT 1

results.question: List all employees and their managers
results.generated_sql: SELECT e.FirstName || ' ' || e.LastName as Employee, m.FirstName || ' ' || m.LastName as Manager FROM employees e LEFT JOIN employees m ON e.ReportsTo = m.EmployeeId

results.question: What is the average track length?
results.generated_sql: SELECT AVG(Milliseconds / 60000.0) as AvgMinutes FROM tracks

results.question: Show revenue by country
results.generated_sql: SELECT BillingCountry, SUM(Total) as Revenue FROM invoices GROUP BY BillingCountry ORDER BY Revenue DESC

results.question: Which customer spent the most money?
results.generated_sql: SELECT c.FirstName, c.LastName, SUM(i.Total) as TotalSpent FROM customers c JOIN invoices i ON c.CustomerId = i.CustomerId GROUP BY c.CustomerId, c.FirstName, c.LastName ORDER BY TotalSpent DESC LIMIT 1

results.question: List all tracks longer than 5 minutes
results.generated_sql: SELECT Name, ROUND(Milliseconds / 60000.0, 2) as Minutes FROM tracks WHERE Milliseconds > 300000 ORDER BY Milliseconds DESC

results.question: How many invoices were created in 2013?
results.generated_sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM invoices WHERE strftime('%Y', InvoiceDate) = '2013'

results.question: Show the total sales for each employee
results.generated_sql:
SELECT e.FirstName, e.LastName, SUM(i.Total) as TotalSales 
FROM employees e 
JOIN customers c ON e.EmployeeId = c.SupportRepId 
JOIN invoices i ON c.CustomerId = i.CustomerId 
GROUP BY e.EmployeeId, e.FirstName, e.LastName 
ORDER BY TotalSales DESC

results.question: What are the 5 longest tracks?
results.generated_sql: SELECT t.Name, ar.Name as Artist, t.Milliseconds FROM tracks t JOIN albums al ON t.AlbumId = al.AlbumId JOIN artists ar ON al.ArtistId = ar.ArtistId ORDER BY t.Milliseconds DESC LIMIT 5

results.question: List customers who have no invoices
results.generated_sql:
SELECT c.CustomerId, c.FirstName, c.LastName, c.Email 
FROM customers c 
LEFT JOIN invoices i ON c.CustomerId = i.CustomerId 
WHERE i.InvoiceId IS NULL

results.question: 顧客は何人いますか？
results.generated_sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers

results.question: 最も売上が高い国はどこですか？
results.generated_sql: SELECT BillingCountry, SUM(Total) as Revenue FROM invoices GROUP BY BillingCountry ORDER BY Revenue DESC LIMIT 1
